text: وَقُرۡءَانٗا فَرَقۡنَٰهُ لِتَقۡرَأَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ مُكۡثٖ وَنَزَّلۡنَٰهُ تَنزِيلٗا

translation.en: And [it is] a Qur'an which We have separated [by intervals] that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively
translation.id: Dan Alquran (kami turunkan) berangsur-angsur agar engkau (Muhammad) membacakannya kepada manusia perlahan-lahan dan Kami menurunkannya secara bertahap
